Class DecodeEvent

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.event.SimulationEvent
microsim.simulation.event.DecodeEvent
public class DecodeEvent extends SimulationEvent
SimulationEvent that represents a decode operation completed by a Processor component.

  • Constructor Details

    • DecodeEvent

      public DecodeEvent(Processor owner, char opcode, Processor.ProcessorState execState, int sourceIndex, int destIndex, boolean hasImmediate)
      Instantiates DecodeEvent getting decode operation information.
      Parameters:
      owner - Processor that raised DecodeEvent
      opcode - opcode to decode
      execState - decoded execution state
      sourceIndex - decoded source register index
      destIndex - decoded source destination index
      hasImmediate - signals if immediate operand is needed
